page.title: 02Clacton's Holiday Camps
page.content:
We have got quite a few holiday camps in our part of Clacton. Their prices range from Â£30 in the low season to about Â£160 in the high season for one week's holiday.
In the bigger camps you will probably find that you will have to pay a little bit more, which is quite reasonable because they will have much more in them. In the little camps you will probably find a small swimming pool, a few shops and a play area. In the bigger camps you will find a much bigger swimming pool, many more shops, clubs, pubs, arcades and equipment hire shops.
The camps provide a lot of jobs for local people, especially in the summer.
